name: Dark - UserStyles
description: Darkens up this website. Supports the new Stylish website!

user.name: DeathTBO
user.about:
((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

FreeStyler & FreeStyler team or other style-ripper bots are not allowed use my themes on any website.

Under "No Redistribution" license you need to ask me to use or modify my styles. If you want to install them from userstyles.org and only apply to stylish or stylus extensions feel free to do so without asking.

((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

Thanks DestructiveBurn for the beautiful license terms.

additional_info:
Version 1.74

Made navigation icons brighter.

Version 1.73

Fixed visited link color.

Version 1.72

Fixed text color in list mode.

Version 1.71

Fixed search icon on the UserStyles forums being a solid white block.

Version 1.7

Added support for style settings panel.

Version 1.6

Fixed forum username finder.

Version 1.5

Supports the latest version of the Stylish website.

Version 1.41

Fixed small messages on the forum.

Version 1.4

Fixed the add user to conversation dropdown.

Version 1.3

Fixed preview on forum posts.

Version 1.2

Updated new discussion background. Darkened header on the forum. Changed text color on the header for readability. The Bookmark icons is slightly darker, but get's brighter on hover.

Version 1.1

Fixed text color on active pages. Fixed quotes not having a background.

Version 1.0

Fixed discussion view.

discussions.name: Perfect! A style that ENHANCES my experience on Userstyles
